metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31436 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: qfq_change_class in net/sched/sch_qfq.c in the Linux kernel before 6.2.13allows an out-of-bounds write because lmax can exceed QFQ_MIN_LMAX.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
